title: Intensive Course on Foreign Language Chinese Teaching Methods Using Smart Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Provision of culturally immersive and interactive experiences similar to real-world scenarios in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain Chinese pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary with over 80% accuracy using Moso Teach (RT) and Rain Classroom (RC) tools
Learners achieve over 90% engagement in role-playing activities that reflect cultural contexts within a digital simulation environment.
Learners pass listening and speaking tasks at the HSK Level 3 standard in a VR-based assessment system with over 75% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
